message.body: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-northern-ireland-22334530 make sure dad sees this video too! This is funny!
Yeah.....it was hard to understand. It wasn't American English but Irish English.
Dress number one from Marshalls ￼
Dess number 2 from narshalls ￼
Number two is more pink but it looks orange in the light.
￼Before
￼After! Yay mulch!
Thanks! I still need one more bag of mulch. Will go back tomorrow
Don't forget to mail mothers day cards!! Then birthday cards next week!
Mothers Day is next Sunday. G,as birthday is the 16, and mom's of course is the 18. I was going to write mom a list of 60 reasons she is awesome. Do you want in on this too?
Ooh thanks!
Okay! Come up with 30 reasons why she is awesome. Email them to me by next Saturday.
Sure!
Oh god! I will try!!

Lol! I was going to combine your 30 and my 30 and put them in her brthday card...i want to mail the card by Tuesday at the latest. So if you don't get them in by Saturday you still have a few more days. :)
That's a tall order!
Lol. Well if it is too much then just let me know
I think I can do it. Nervous about starting school this week. So it's reasons she is awesome?
Yeah. Can be anything. Sme I was thinking of was "walked around on a broke foot for a weekend before discovering it was broken". Tings like tht
Perfect. Got it. I will do my best.
Cute! I am going to go shopping at Giant now! New grocery store!

￼Thats my little had held device that i scanned and bagged as I shopped. It tracks the price on the top left, abd the savings ob the top right. Then every so ofteb it will beep and tell me somehing else that is on sale ib the atore. It was different!! Som
￼Mother's Day card from Puff
Hahahahha! Thats awesome!
You should joke with him if he is itchy and getting cold turkey skin.
I love ot! Im ayill at work
Congrats! Im still at work!
I hope you get home soon! Notes night! ✏
I am just now looking at Puff. That is so cute!

I remember when I was little mom would think I was dead and she would put her finger up underneath my nose to see if I was breathing. One time when I was 12 I woke up to mom doing this and got so mad! Haha. Looking back now I think it was funny. When I th

Im going to get someing from syarbicks and a donut from dunkin donuts and head into the office. So far a no- show. I made 97.75 hours (need to aim for 100) for April! Woohoo! Starting the first month of this quarter strong!
